channel.title: Craigslist easy-poster?
channel.description:
Hey guys. I've got this gig-like thing where I'm making money via selling someone else's shit on craigslist. Basically, I get paid if he gets paid. So, I want to market as many products as possible.
I want to write some form of script, or whatever would be needed, to make posting to craigslist easier. I will only be selling items, nothing more, meaning the "type" won't change (I saw this in the url, I believe they use php GET_ for it). But each post has an auto-generated url (go to craigslist and hit the post button, you'll see what I mean). Then from there you select the type and the next page will add "?s=cat" on it (cat is for "for sale by owner" option). The next part is where you select the item type. This will vary, so I'd have to make some form of a selection box. After that selection, is the key page. I want the contact information to be auto-filled (since I'm doing this for the same person X times over), as well as the location and general shit like it.
Lastly, I'd want to save the urls, I understand I could look them up in my account, but I want to quickly link him to each one after it's posted.
I don't care what language I have to write this in (as long as I know it). I prefer Java, just because it's my strong suit. HTML/PHP is fine as well, I can even write a flash app (rofl) for it. I don't know RoR, Perl, or shit like that. Never got far in web dev.

item.title: Craigslist easy-poster?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

the script provided has an example showing you how it could look - but the entire page shows you tags you can use, and possible values for them. all you have to do is copy that script, modify it, and boom.

Read full topic

item.title: Craigslist easy-poster?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Vain_:

you post via rss as well, not just a return.

I know nothing of rss. I’m going to go look for some api or library for it in Java and see what I can do.

Read full topic

item.title: Craigslist easy-poster?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Vain_:

have you even looked into http://www.craigslist.org/about/bulk_posting_interface

No because I didn’t even see that on the site, so I’ll look at it and report back.
Edit: They have a sample written in perl5 and it returns some RSS. I’ll have to look into converting or writing similar.

Read full topic
